definition: to identify clearly/to make sure of/to believe firmly

sentences.english: The beginning of wisdom is to call things by their rightful names.
sentences.chinese: 公正的認準每件事物是智慧的開端。

sentences.english: Adults always know and stick to one thing.
sentences.chinese: 大人們總是知道一件事，就認準一件事。

sentences.english: So when choosing the best look for the brand of car interior.
sentences.chinese: 所以在選擇汽車內飾的時候最好認準大品牌。

sentences.english: Please remember the sign of the Minlongda brand, and be ware of imitations .
sentences.chinese: 承蒙惠顧，請認準閩龍達商標標誌，謹防假冒。

sentences.english: Sorrow makes us go slower and more considerately , and introspect our motives and dispositions.
sentences.chinese: 憂愁也使我們不急躁，認準動機和目標。

sentences.english: Chinese Mu Ou the north, the country to find the valve Kay, look for the "National Kai" label.
sentences.chinese: 中國慕甌北，閥門找國凱，請認準“國凱”的商標。

sentences.english: Just focus on the direction you need to take.
sentences.chinese: 只要你專注你認準的方向。

sentences.english: I believethefirst test of truly great man is his humility.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲認準一個大丈夫的首要測試就是他的謙遜。
